S

Scientist - Class in crew
the CrewMember subclass Scientist causes the hasScientist() method of any CrewState it is stored in to return true.
Scientist(String) - Constructor for class crew.Scientist
creates a Scientist with the given name.
SCIENTIST - crew.CrewMemberType
 
sellItem(Item) - Method in class main.Shop
sells an Item and removes it from the shop's inventory.
setActionEvents(GameAction, WeightedArrayList<GameEvent>) - Method in class eventmanager.GameEventManager
Should be run on startup sets the events associated with a GameAction.
setCrewState(CrewState) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
sets the GameEnvironment's CrewState.
setCurrentPlanet(Planet) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Sets the current planet of the game.
setDescription(String) - Method in class items.Item
sets the description of an Item.
setEventManager(GameEventManager) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
sets the game's GameEventManager.
setFullness(int) - Method in class crew.CrewMember
Sets fullness with range 0 to maxFullness.
setFunds(int) - Method in class crew.CrewState
sets the funds of the player's crew.
setHealth(int) - Method in class crew.CrewMember
Sets the crew member's health with range 0 to maxFullness.
setHealth(int) - Method in class crew.Student
 
setNumDays(int) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
sets the maximum number of days the game will last.
setNumDays(int) - Method in class main.GameSetup
sets the number of days the game should last.
setPart(ShipPart) - Method in class main.Planet
sets the ShipPart found on this Planet.
setPlanets(List<Planet>) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
sets the List of planets the player can travel to.
setRandomSeed(long) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
sets the random generator seed to be used by the event system.
setRestedness(int) - Method in class crew.CrewMember

setupGame(boolean) - Method in class main.GameEnvironment
Creates a GameSetup object to initialise GameEnvironment.

setWeapon(ShipWeaponItem) - Method in class crew.Ship

SHIELD_BONUS - Static variable in class crew.Investor
 
Ship - Class in crew
Ship class has a name, shield level and weapon.
Ship(String) - Constructor for class crew.Ship
default constructor sets the ship's name.
Ship(String, int) - Constructor for class crew.Ship
extended constructor sets the ship's name and max shield level.
ShipPart - Class in items
Item subclass that represents the ShipParts that players must locate to win the game.
ShipPart() - Constructor for class items.ShipPart
creates a new ShipPart object.
ShipPartFindEvent - Class in eventmanager
ShipPartFindEvent adds the Planet ShipPart to the Crew's Inventory.
ShipPartFindEvent() - Constructor for class eventmanager.ShipPartFindEvent
 
ShipShieldUpgradeItem - Class in items
Item subclass that implements the ShipUpgrade interface.
ShipShieldUpgradeItem(String, int, int) - Constructor for class items.ShipShieldUpgradeItem
constructs item that when used upgrades the ship's max shield.
ShipUpgrade - Interface in items
interface to be used by Items that affect a Ship object.
ShipWeaponItem - Class in items
Item subclass that implements ShipUpgrade and acts as a weapon that can be attached to a Ship object.
ShipWeaponItem(String, int, int) - Constructor for class items.ShipWeaponItem
constructs item that when used upgrades the ship's max shield.
Shop - Class in main
Shop is a shop that players can buy and sell items to.
Shop(String, ArrayList<Item>, double, double) - Constructor for class main.Shop
Initialises a Shop that sells items in a given inventory with buy and sell price modifiers.
Shop(String, List<Item>) - Constructor for class main.Shop
Initialises a Shop object that sells items in a given inventory.
ShopWindow - Class in gui
 
ShopWindow(GameEnvironment) - Constructor for class gui.ShopWindow
Create the application.
sleep() - Method in class crew.CrewMember
Restores DEFAULT_SLEEP_RESTORE if has actions available.
SpacePlagueEvent - Class in eventmanager
SpacePlagueEvent gives a random crew member the PLAGUED effect and a random amount of damage.
SpacePlagueEvent() - Constructor for class eventmanager.SpacePlagueEvent
 
startGame() - Method in class commandline.CommandLineRunner
Starts up the main game loop for the command line version.
STRESSED - crew.CrewMemberEffect
 
Student - Class in crew
the CrewMember subclass Student has 3 max action points and 50 max health, fullness, and restedness.
Student(String) - Constructor for class crew.Student
creates a Student with the given name.
STUDENT - crew.CrewMemberType
